NPC ID7201

Briget is the owner of Briget's Weapons in Shayzien. Players cannot access her shop until they have at least 20% Shayzien favour.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update)
  • The NPC's name was changed from "Quartermaster Briget" to "Briget".
  • Briget no longer runs an armour shop; it is now run by Blair.
  • Briget has been graphically updated, now wearing tier 3 Shayzien armour instead of tier 5.
  • Her examine text was changed; previously, it was "Distributing weapons and armour to those who need them."
